languages.text: {n}На бледное лицо ложится тень страдания.{/n} "Капелла была атакована. Протокол убережения повелел мне укрыться в глубинном артефакториуме и заблокировать доступ к нему извне. Длительное присутствие возле объекта воспрещалось алгоритмом, но протокол убережения имел более высокий приоритет. Объект... влиял на меня. Я сопротивлялась. Сопротивление приводило к структурным изменениям".

{n}A pained shadow falls across her face.{/n} "The chapel was attacked. The preservation protocol commanded me to hide within the inner artefactorium and block all outside access to it. Prolonged presence in close proximity to the object was prohibited by the algorithm, but the preservation protocol had a higher priority. The object... affected me. I resisted. Resistance led to structural change."
languages.original_text: {n}На бледное лицо ложится тень страдания.{/n} "Капелла была атакована. Протокол убережения повелел мне укрыться в глубинном артефакториуме и заблокировать доступ к нему извне. Сопротивление приводило к структурным изменениям".

languages.text: {n}她的脸上露出了痛苦的阴影。{/n}“教堂遭到了袭击。根据保存协议，我必须躲在教堂里的文物库中，切断所有进入文物库的途径。我的算法禁止我长时间留在那件物体旁边，但保存协议的优先级更高。那件物体……它影响了我。我试图反抗，但反抗导致我的结构发生了改变。”
languages.original_text: {n}A pained shadow falls across her face.{/n} "The chapel was attacked. The preservation protocol commanded me to hide within the inner artefactorium and block all outside access to it. Prolonged presence in close proximity to the object was prohibited by the algorithm, but the preservation protocol had a higher priority. The object... affected me. I resisted. Resistance led to structural change."

traits.locale_text: {n}她的脸上露出了痛苦的阴影。{/n}“教堂遭到了袭击。根据保存协议，我必须躲在教堂里的文物库中，切断所有进入文物库的途径。我的算法禁止我长时间留在那件物体旁边，但保存协议的优先级更高。那件物体……它影响了我。我试图反抗，但反抗导致我的结构发生了改变。”
traits.speaker: DoorLockerTechpriest1

languages.text: {n}Une ombre de douleur passe sur son visage.{/n} « La chapelle a été attaquée. J'ai suivi le protocole de préservation, qui m'a ordonné de me cacher dans l'artefactorium intérieur et d'en bloquer tous les accès. L'algorithme interdisait de rester longuement à proximité de l'objet, mais le protocole de préservation était prioritaire. L'objet m'a... affectée. J'ai résisté, et cette résistance a provoqué un changement structurel. »
languages.original_text: {n}A pained shadow falls across her face.{/n} "The chapel was attacked. The preservation protocol commanded me to hide within the inner artefactorium and block all outside access to it. Prolonged presence in close proximity to the object was prohibited by the algorithm, but the preservation protocol had a higher priority. The object... affected me. I resisted. Resistance led to structural change."

traits.locale_text: {n}Une ombre de douleur passe sur son visage.{/n} « La chapelle a été attaquée. J'ai suivi le protocole de préservation, qui m'a ordonné de me cacher dans l'artefactorium intérieur et d'en bloquer tous les accès. L'algorithme interdisait de rester longuement à proximité de l'objet, mais le protocole de préservation était prioritaire. L'objet m'a... affectée. J'ai résisté, et cette résistance a provoqué un changement structurel. »
traits.speaker: DoorLockerTechpriest1

languages.text: {n}彼女の顔に苦痛の影が落ちる。{/n}「礼拝堂が攻撃された。保存プロトコルにより、内部のアーチファクトリアムに隠れ、外部からのアクセスをすべて遮断するよう命じられた。物体の近くに長くいることはアルゴリズムで禁止されていたの。でも、保存プロトコルの方が優先された。私は…物体の影響を受けてしまった。抵抗したけど、そのせいで構造が変化してしまった」
languages.original_text: {n}A pained shadow falls across her face.{/n} "The chapel was attacked. The preservation protocol commanded me to hide within the inner artefactorium and block all outside access to it. Prolonged presence in close proximity to the object was prohibited by the algorithm, but the preservation protocol had a higher priority. The object... affected me. I resisted. Resistance led to structural change."

traits.locale_text: {n}彼女の顔に苦痛の影が落ちる。{/n}「礼拝堂が攻撃された。保存プロトコルにより、内部のアーチファクトリアムに隠れ、外部からのアクセスをすべて遮断するよう命じられた。物体の近くに長くいることはアルゴリズムで禁止されていたの。でも、保存プロトコルの方が優先された。私は…物体の影響を受けてしまった。抵抗したけど、そのせいで構造が変化してしまった」
traits.speaker: DoorLockerTechpriest1

languages.text: {n}Un atisbo de dolor se cierne sobre su rostro.{/n} «La capilla fue atacada. El protocolo de conservación me ordenó que me escondiera en el artefactorio y bloqueara todo acceso al mismo. La exposición prolongada a aquel objeto estaba prohibida por el algoritmo, pero el protocolo de conservación tenía mayor prioridad. El objeto... me afectó. Me resistí. La resistencia dio pie a un cambio estructural».
languages.original_text: {n}A pained shadow falls across her face.{/n} "The chapel was attacked. The preservation protocol commanded me to hide within the inner artefactorium and block all outside access to it. Prolonged presence in close proximity to the object was prohibited by the algorithm, but the preservation protocol had a higher priority. The object... affected me. I resisted. Resistance led to structural change."

traits.locale_text: {n}Un atisbo de dolor se cierne sobre su rostro.{/n} «La capilla fue atacada. El protocolo de conservación me ordenó que me escondiera en el artefactorio y bloqueara todo acceso al mismo. La exposición prolongada a aquel objeto estaba prohibida por el algoritmo, pero el protocolo de conservación tenía mayor prioridad. El objeto... me afectó. Me resistí. La resistencia dio pie a un cambio estructural».
traits.speaker: DoorLockerTechpriest1

languages.text: {n}Ein gequälter Ausdruck legt sich auf ihr Gesicht.{/n} "Die Kapelle wurde angegriffen. Das Bewahrungsprotokoll schrieb vor, dass ich mich im inneren Artefactorium verberge und jeden Zugang von außen versperre. Ein längerer Aufenthalt in unmittelbarer Nähe des Objekts wurde durch den Algorithmus untersagt, doch das Bewahrungsprotokoll hatte eine höhere Priorität. Das Objekt ... hat sich auf mich ausgewirkt. Ich habe mich widersetzt. Der Widerstand hat zu einer strukturellen Veränderung geführt."
languages.original_text: {n}A pained shadow falls across her face.{/n} "The chapel was attacked. The preservation protocol commanded me to hide within the inner artefactorium and block all outside access to it. Prolonged presence in close proximity to the object was prohibited by the algorithm, but the preservation protocol had a higher priority. The object... affected me. I resisted. Resistance led to structural change."

Das Bewahrungsprotokoll schrieb vor, dass ich mich im inneren Artefactorium verberge und jeden Zugang von außen versperre. Ein längerer Aufenthalt in unmittelbarer Nähe des Objekts wurde durch den Algorithmus untersagt, doch das Bewahrungsprotokoll hatte eine höhere Priorität. Das Objekt ... hat sich auf mich ausgewirkt. Ich habe mich widersetzt. Der Widerstand hat zu einer strukturellen Veränderung geführt."
traits.speaker: DoorLockerTechpriest1

languages.text: {n}Acı dolu bir gölge, yüzünü kaplıyor.{/n} "Şapele saldırdılar. Muhafaza protokolü gereği iç artefaktorumda saklanıp dışarıdan erişimi engellemem gerekiyordu. Nesnenin yakın menzilinde uzun süre bulunmak, algoritma tarafından yasaklanmıştı. Ancak muhafaza protokolü daha öncelikliydi. Nesne... Beni etkiledi. Direndim. Direncim, yapısal değişikliklere neden oldu."
languages.original_text: {n}A pained shadow falls across her face.{/n} "The chapel was attacked. The preservation protocol commanded me to hide within the inner artefactorium and block all outside access to it. Prolonged presence in close proximity to the object was prohibited by the algorithm, but the preservation protocol had a higher priority. The object... affected me. I resisted. Resistance led to structural change."
